name: Reception
blurb: This is the school's reception. Broken glass and paper covers the floor

name: Hallway
blurb: You enter the main hallway. It is pitch black. There are no windows at all.

name: DT Room
blurb: You are in the school's workshop. Splintered wood and rusted metal lay dormant on shelves. There is a suspicious lack of power tools.

name: Cafeteria
blurb: You stand in the school cafeteria. Try as you might there are no turkey twizzlers to be found. Absolute shambles tbh.

name: Science Lab
blurb: The school science lab is full of foul smelling chemicals and thriving agar cultures. A dead calf floats idly in a jar of formaldhyde.
